summary: Multi-language support testing completed successfully. All 10 languages (English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Dutch) are working correctly. Language selector dropdown shows all languages with flags, language switching updates UI text immediately, and language persistence works after page reload.

issues: Giveaway popup appears on every page load and is not translated - shows English text regardless of selected language

action_items: Consider translating the giveaway popup modal content to match selected language
critical_code_review_comments: i18n setup is well-structured with proper language detection order (navigator, localStorage, cookie, htmlTag)
Language persistence uses localStorage and cookie caching which is correct
All 10 translation files are comprehensive with consistent key structure
LanguageSelector component properly uses i18n.changeLanguage() for switching
All major components (Header, Footer, Hero, TrustBar) correctly use useTranslation hook
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-language feature is fully functional. All 10 languages tested: EN, ES, FR, DE, PT, IT, JA, ZH, KO, NL. Language selector in header works correctly. Language persistence via localStorage/cookie is working. Only minor issue: giveaway popup modal is not translated.
